detail_desc: Swim shorts in a printed weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Body in soft, patterned viscose jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a zip at the top and press-studs at the crotch.
Joggers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and cuffed hems. Zipped side pockets and two back pockets, one with a zip.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric. Sweatshirt with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Trousers with elasticated ribbing at the waist. Soft brushed inside.
Shirt in woven fabric with a lined, drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved top in linen jersey with a V-neck.

Blouse in a patterned weave with a collar, concealed hook-and-eye fastening on one shoulder and short, cuffed puff sleeves with pleating and buttons. Tapered waist with a sewn-on belt that ties at the back.
Elastic hairband with large, decorative flowers.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Small metal earrings with enamelled details. Size from 1 cm to 2 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Sandals in imitation leather with an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening and a loop at the back. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short-sleeved top in a loose rib knit. Deep neckline at the back with a twisted detail at the hem.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Slim legs with narrow hems.
Wide, off-the-shoulder top in a patterned viscose weave with a frill trim and elastication around the top and short trumpet sleeves.
Sunglasses with metal frames and asymmetric, UV-protective, tinted lenses.
All-in-one suit in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems, and press-studs on one shoulder, at the crotch and down the legs. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket and narrow ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in soft satin. Short-sleeved shirt with notch lapels and buttons down the front. Wide, ankle-length bottoms with an elasticated waist.
V-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Lightweight jacket in a patterned weave. Detachable hood with an elasticated edge and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Adjustable elastication at the waist, front pockets and elasticated cuffs. Lined.
3/4-length leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Sunglasses with transparent plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Leather sandals with crossover straps at the front, padded leather insoles and rubber soles.

Short dress in chiffon crêpe with inset lace trims, an opening and button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves with flounces at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Oversized jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some alpaca wool with a round neckline and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Top in patterned jersey with a small stand-up collar, V-neck with pleats at the front and gathered yoke at the back. Decorative gathers at the shoulders and long balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline with a narrow ribbed trim.
Short dress in jersey with glitter. V-neck with a wrapover and draping, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Short 5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shirt in cotton flannel with a detachable, lined hood in jersey and a yoke at the back. Buttons down the front and at the cuffs, an open chest pocket and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Padded parka in a cotton weave with a lined, detachable hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud and a single back vent. Lined.
Short, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with a low neckline at the front, visible zip at the top and long sleeves.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, padded, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped front pockets, inner ribbing and a tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs, and folded seams. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Baby Exclusive. Down all-in-one suit with a soft velour lining and detachable faux-fur lined hood. Diagonal zip at the front that continues down one leg and narrow elastication around the hood, cuffs and hems. The cuffs and hems have foldover sections to enclose the hands and feet for added warmth. Filling 80% down, 20% feather.
Sandals with square toes, narrow straps and covered block heels. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a high, ribbed stand-up collar, decorative beading at the front and down the sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy weave with a crinkled effect. Elastication and a wide flounce at the top, and long, slightly wider sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Jersey lining.
Long, wide jumper in fine-knit cashmere with a ribbed polo neck, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and slits in the sides.
Short polo-neck top in viscose jersey with long sleeves.
Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with ties at the back and back of the neck and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood with a narrow elasticated edge, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Straight-cut, long-sleeved top in jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline and a print motif.
Short top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood and long, wide sleeves.
Deck shoes in cotton canvas with lacing at the top and a moccasin seam at the front. Cotton canvas linings, patterned imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Dungaree shorts in stretch denim with adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a pocket at the top and front and back pockets. Buttons at the sides and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Fitted, quilted, lightweight jacket with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front and front pockets. Filling 80% down and 20% feathers. Supplied with a practical storage bag with an elasticated drawstring. Size of bag 11x24.5 cm.
Fully-fashioned trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh insoles and rubber soles.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons on one shoulder, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut double-breasted jacket woven in a viscose blend with notch lapels and flap front pockets. Lined.

Waterproof hi-tops in imitation suede with reflective details. Elasticated lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top, and a loop at the back. Velour linings and insoles. Chunky rubber soles.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and full coverage at the back.
High-waisted cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Shorts in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and a back pocket.

Shirt woven in a cotton blend with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Tuxedo trousers in a stretch wool weave with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and concealed button. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with satin stripes down the sides and creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with an opening with lacing and lace embroidery at the back, and short sleeves with overlocked edges.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with hard-worn details and a print motif on one leg. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft cotton. T-shirt in block-coloured jersey with a print motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Matching, block-coloured shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Joggers in lightweight, washed denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons down the front and a scalloped trim around the neckline and cuffs. Ribbed hem and short slits in the sides.
Straight-style jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs.
Shirt dress in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Thin metal Alice band decorated with a chain.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and frill-trimmed elastication at the top, both front and back.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Short, thin metal chain necklace with a bar-shaped bead. Adjustable length approx. 42-50 cm.
5-pocket, high-waisted shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Slip-on trainers in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings, canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Knee-length shorts in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and front and back pockets.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacquard-knit tube scarf with ribbed edges. Width 24 cm, circumference 48 cm.
Metal hoop earrings in various designs, two pairs decorated with plastic beads and three pairs decorated with rhinestones.

Dress in a crisp, patterned cotton weave with a round neckline and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short, elasticated puff sleeves and a gathered seam at the top for added width. Unlined.
